Bom, se tiver amigos para jogar com vc de bom vira um Excelente
I donty like the fucking game

This game has so many potential to become a big game like others to be known worldwide....Its not only because the concept of chasing game but they provide a good backstory that many of us will enjoy to read both killer and survivor... I love this game because it gave me a lot of inspiration to create a best storytelling from the character they created.. 

REASON TO PLAY DEAD BY DAYLIGHT 
* Creating a momentum of teamwork and team building.
* Fun to chase and to be chase.
* This game will not stress you out because of rank and probably u wont even care about it since rank does not give u fancy reward rather just a cosmetic display.
* Less toxic than many coop games that you played.
Like to challenge how high your [spoiler]toxic endurance[/spoiler] level can go? This is one of the best game for you!

The core gameplay is pretty fun, and it has a lot of cool characters, especially the licensed DLC. The playerbase can be pretty toxic at some times but that's par for the course in any online game. There are some times where there's a lot of bugs, which can be a headache but when everything is going well it's a lot of fun, especially when you survive together with friends.
